extendedInfo.description: The wisdom of the ganja. Yum fortune cookies are always fun and tasty. Well how about opening up yourself a Fortune Ganja and get yourself some Ganja Wisdom and soak in that wisdom by taking a rip of your bong! If you want to share it with your friends click the SMS button to send it in a text.Plenty of updates to come with plenty more fortunes! If you have any requests for a fortune or a quote you would like to see it feel free to send me an email or if you have any other features you would like added.Open the ganja. Read your fortune. And smoke a bowl to soak it in!Any problems, questions, concerns, or suggestions send an email to FALLACYSTUDIOS@GMAIL.COM.Check out other related apps by Fallacy Studios. Stoner's Handbook, PotHead Games, and PotHead Guide!TAGS: weed, ganja, bowl, smoke, bud, marijuana, toke, high, fortune, fun, funny, smoke, cannabis, hit, piece, pipe, bong(c)2011 Fallacy Studios
